Front of the house.Body: You seem to be outside of a house. You see the front door with cute garden gnomes to the side of the door.

Living room.Body: You head inside and you see the living room for the house. There seems to be a door that leads to the kitchen, and stairs that go upstairs.

Hallway.Body: You are now in a hallway. You see a door to your right that has barking from inside. There is a note on the door that reads: 'The door is locked. You need to find the key to open it.' You also see a drawer next to it.

Key.Body: You found a key inside the drawer!

Room.Body: You open the door and find the main room with a dog inside! You get a text from the owner of the house to take care of him and that there is stuff for the dog in the kitchen pantry!

Kitchen.Body: You are now in the kitchen.

Choices.Text: Go back to the living room?

Hungry.Body: You felt hungry and ate goldfish!

Choices.Text: You should probably find out why you are here.
